notes: Multiple instances of Water Regen fully stack.

The river bonuses are applied when the wielder makes physical contact with the water of the river. This means if they get moved out of it vertically, the bonuses are lost as well, until they land back in the water. The bonuses of the river do not linger at all.
Can regenerate up to 360 health and 180 mana in one minute.
Also works with puddles created by Slithereen Crush's Aghanim's Scepter upgrade, if held by the caster.
abilities.description: Provides you with 6 HP regen and 3 mana regen while in the river.
